summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 14.1°C) and outside temperature (down 11.3°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 422 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; cold temperatures are forecasted. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and winds should remain light. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dim outside. Changeable conditions.
